articles.title: How Do Cells Select the Right DNA Damage Repair Pathway? - Technology Networks
articles.description: Cells within plant leaves can detect mechanical pressure to determine where they are and what cells they become in response to damage.
articles.content:
Plants have an impressive ability to regenerate damaged tissues, but how they do it is not fully understood. Now, researchers from Japan have discovered the mechanisms involved in this superpower.
